name: ultra-best-burgers
description: Ultra Best Burgers Full Stack is a web application for a burger restaurant that offers quality burgers. Built with a full stack development approach, the application features a user-friendly interface for customers to order online, and a robust admin panel for managing the restaurant's menu, orders, and customer data. The application uses modern technologies such as React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and the Imgur API to ensure a fast and reliable experience for both customers and restaurant owners.
author: xSpinoza
